long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep yourself hydrated during your screen time in an aesthetically pleasing and effective way. This pop-up will repeat automatically, reminding you to drink water.

To use:
Pin the extension and click on it. the timer will not start until you press the play button. And alarm will sound every 20 minutes to take a drink of water. It will repeat until you press the stop button. The pop-up should be small enough that you can continue to work effectively while it is still open so you can see the timer.
